# Pull Request Template

Thank you for your contribution! ğŸ’™

**Before submitting, please ensure:**

- [ ] Your branch is up-to-date with the target branch (`git pull --rebase`)
- [ ] All tests pass (`make test` or equivalent)
- [ ] You've run linters/formatting
- [ ] Code is self-reviewed

**Choose the right template** (copy-paste the link below into your browser while creating the PR):

- âœ¨ New Feature / Enhancement â†’ [Use Feature Template](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/YOUR_REPO/compare/main...YOUR_BRANCH?template=feature.md)
- ğŸ› Bug Fix â†’ [Use Bugfix Template](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/YOUR_REPO/compare/main...YOUR_BRANCH?template=bugfix.md)
- ğŸ”§ Refactor / Tech Debt â†’ [Use Refactor Template](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/YOUR_REPO/compare/main...YOUR_BRANCH?template=refactor.md)

If none fit perfectly, just continue with this default.
